import React from 'react'; import '../styles/Research.css'; import { FaBrain, FaLock, FaHandshake, FaGavel } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Research = () => { return (
{/* Mission Statement Section */}

Pioneering Research on Autonomous Intelligence

Our research aims to push the boundaries of AI technology, leading to fully autonomous systems capable of solving complex, human-level problems. Autonomy Labs is committed to creating safe, scalable, and efficient AGI solutions that will revolutionize industries.

AGI is multi-faceted

{/* Research Teams Section */}

Research Teams

Interpretability

The mission of the Interpretability team is to discover and understand how large language models work internally â€” the foundation of ensuring safety and positive outcomes.

Alignment

The Alignment team works to understand and develop ways to keep future advancements in AI helpful, honest, and harmless.

Societal Impacts

Working closely with policy and trust & safety teams, the Societal Impacts team is a technical research team that looks to ensure AI interacts positively with people.

{/* Featured Research Links Section */}

Featured paper

Mapping the Mind of a Large Language Model

Featured paper

Many-shot Jailbreaking

Featured paper

Sleeper Agents: Training Deceptive LLMs Through Safety Training

Featured news

Measuring the Persuasiveness of Language Models

); }; export default Research;
